Body:
""" Get the plotting dimensions
    Returns
    -------

    """
npanels, maxp = 1, 25
pages, npp = qa.get_dimen(npanels, maxp=maxp)
assert len(pages) == 1 and pages[0][0] * pages[0][1] == 1 and len(npp
    ) == 1 and npp[0] == npanels
npanels, maxp = 5, 5
pages, npp = qa.get_dimen(npanels, maxp=maxp)
assert len(pages) == 1 and pages[0][0] * pages[0][1] == 6 and len(npp
    ) == 1 and npp[0] == npanels
npanels, maxp = 22, 8
pages, npp = qa.get_dimen(npanels, maxp=maxp)
assert len(pages) == 3 and pages[0][0] * pages[0][1] == maxp and pages[1][0
    ] * pages[1][1] == maxp
assert len(npp) == 3 and npp[0] == maxp and npp[1] == maxp and npp[2] == 6
npanels, maxp = 22, 7
pages, npp = qa.get_dimen(npanels, maxp=maxp)
assert len(pages) == 4 and pages[0][0] * pages[0][1] == maxp + 1 and pages[1][0
    ] * pages[1][1] == maxp + 1 and pages[2][0] * pages[2][1
    ] == maxp + 1 and pages[3][0] * pages[3][1] == 1
assert len(npp) == 4 and npp[0] == maxp and npp[1] == maxp and npp[2
    ] == maxp and npp[3] == 1
